org.youscope.common.microscope

Interface StageDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Device, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface StageDevice
extends Device
    Author:
    langmo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double getPosition()
      Returns the current position of the plate.
      double getUnitMagnifier()
      Returns the magnification factor from native stage device units to micro meters: microMeters = units * unitMagnifier
      boolean isTransposeX()
      Returns if the x-direction is transposed (x -> -x).
      boolean isTransposeY()
      Returns if the y-direction is transposed (y -> -y).

      Sets the absolute position of the stage.

      Sets the position of the stage relative to the current position.

      Sets if the x-direction should be transposed.
      void setTransposeY(boolean transpose)
      Sets if the y-direction should be transposed.

      Sets the magnification factor from native stage device units to micro meters: microMeters = units * unitMagnifier

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(double x,
                 double y)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 MicroscopeLockedException,
                 MicroscopeException,
                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Sets the absolute position of the stage. Same as setPosition(x, y, true).
        Parameters:
        x - X-position of the stage in mu.
        y - Y-Position of the stage in mu.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MicroscopeLockedException
        MicroscopeException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setRelativePosition

        void setRelativePosition(double dx,
                         double dy)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         MicroscopeLockedException,
                         MicroscopeException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Sets the position of the stage relative to the current position.
        Parameters:
        dx - relative X-position of the stage.
        dy - relative Y-Position of the stage.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MicroscopeLockedException
        MicroscopeException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • setTransposeX

        void setTransposeX(boolean transpose)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                   MicroscopeLockedException
        Sets if the x-direction should be transposed. If true, all x-coordinates are replaced by their negative value (x -> -x). This is done automatically for all position related functions.
        Parameters:
        transpose - True, if the x-direction should be transposed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • setTransposeY

        void setTransposeY(boolean transpose)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                   MicroscopeLockedException
        Sets if the y-direction should be transposed. If true, all y-coordinates are replaced by their negative value (y -> -y). This is done automatically for all position related functions.
        Parameters:
        transpose - True, if the y-direction should be transposed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MicroscopeLockedException

      • isTransposeX

        boolean isTransposeX()
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns if the x-direction is transposed (x -> -x). This function is for information only, the change of the direction is done automatically.
        Returns:
        True, if the x-direction is transposed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • isTransposeY

        boolean isTransposeY()
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns if the y-direction is transposed (y -> -y). This function is for information only, the change of the direction is done automatically.
        Returns:
        True, if the y-direction is transposed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getUnitMagnifier

        double getUnitMagnifier()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns the magnification factor from native stage device units to micro meters: microMeters = units * unitMagnifier
        Returns:
        Magnification factor for native stage unit to micro meter conversion.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • setUnitMagnifier

        void setUnitMagnifier(double unitMagnifier)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                      MicroscopeLockedException
        Sets the magnification factor from native stage device units to micro meters: microMeters = units * unitMagnifier
        Parameters:
        unitMagnifier - Magnification factor for native stage unit to micro meter conversion.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        MicroscopeLockedException
